title: Receptiviti API — receptiviti
text: text character vector text processed. output Path .csv file write results . already exists, loaded instead processing text. key API Key; defaults Sys.getenv("RECEPTIVITI_KEY"). secret API Secret; defaults Sys.getenv("RECEPTIVITI_SECRET"). url API endpoint; defaults Sys.getenv("RECEPTIVITI_URL"), defaults "https://api.receptiviti.com/". retry_limit Maximum number times request can retried hitting rate limit. cache Logical; FALSE, temporarily store responses, avoid making requests multiple times. verbose Logical; TRUE, show status messages.

title: Receptiviti API — receptiviti
text: data.frame columns text (originally entered text), response_id, language, version (metadata API), scores included framework (e.g., summary.word_count liwc.).

title: Receptiviti API — receptiviti
code: if (FALSE) { # score a single text single <- receptiviti("a text to score")  # score multiple texts, and write results to a file multi <- receptiviti(c("first text to score", "second text"), "filename.csv") }
